attributes.action: Make catcalling a criminal offence in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Catcalling hugely perpetuates rape culture and is a huge factor which makes people feel unsafe when travelling around the country, especially late at night. By making it a fineable crime people may be less likely to catcall and also it may contribute to making people feel safer when travelling.
attributes.background: Pass a legislation to make catcalling an offence that can be punished by a fine of £1,000.

rejection.details: Make sexual harassment a specific criminal offence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578940
